Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (9/08/2022)
------------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (9/08/2022)
------------------
- Mistake fix

0.0.3 (10/08/2022)
------------------
- Alerts user that encryption keywords with spaces cannot be used

0.0.4 (10/08/2022)
------------------
- Bug fix

0.0.5 (11/08/2022)
------------------
- Bug fix (Now allows encryption keywords with lengths bigger than the plain text)
